ewita daruwan gana handa doda palak natha.

mara dewal godak karalane!
me ee sanwadaya thamayi.
ee wagema kalu kada hewath hora awi jawaram karuwan samaga ganudenu karanne thrasthawadi sanwidhana.
wayasgatha wanawita saukhyaye pirihimak da sidu wana athara wiwidha belahinatha athiwanu pene.
thawaduratath owunge pramithiya ha eyala labapu puhunuwa gana gataluwak nam owunge sima wasika kalaya dirgha kala yuthuyi.
paya kalak pamana gatha wannata atha.
api me pilibanda kisiwak noliyannemu.

eheth muhuna usata wawunu enasal path matha srujuwa nosali un wenath manayaka hamudawak ape ath, gela ha muhunata da ilakka labagena awasan bawa watahune indunilge kana pitupasin ohu kudallaku gala wu wita ya.
passe wade nagala giya nisa unwa athi karannath patan aran.
eeth mama ?
me widihata siyalla siduwenawanam ape aramunu wadi aathaka noweyi’ yayi prakasha kalaya.
eeke thamayi apita wada karanna thibune.
nomile kondam labagatha haki yanthra pansiyak ratapura sthapitha kirimata saukhya amathyanshaye ech.ayi.wi. eeds mardana wadasatahana thiranaya kara thibe.
eya wenas kirima sandaha deshapalana paksha ha ema pakshawala nayakayan awanka uthsahayak dara natha.
oya rodewath nat ekawath aaye hamba wenne na“

mehidi basnahira palath karmantha departhamenthuwa yatathe palanaya wana pesha nishpadana ha puhunu madhyasthana wethin puhunuwa laba awasan karanu labana karmika piris wetha rakiya laba dime aramunin rajya aayathana menma paudgalika anshayeda pesha aashritha nishpadana sadaha anawum bhara ganimath awashya nishpadanayan itu kara dimath mema departhamenthuwa magin sidu karanu labayi.

motar rathaye widuru kabali andumwala thibiya yuthu bawath, eewa mangin itha wadagath thorathuru anawaranaya kara ganimata haki wanu athi bawath parikshana pawathwana kandayam saka hara wishwasa karayi.
